transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan, hello. Hello. Ji sir, good afternoon.
Executive: Mam, mujhe fir wo 50 lead chahiye mam, fir mam kya ho raha hai isme ye.
Customer: To sir aap se unhone baat nahi kari, Harshit Dubey jo hai?
Executive: Nahi meri kisi se koi baat nahi hui. Bas ye dekho mere friend circle mein aisa hi hua hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jisko hai na 10 lead mili hai, unko thode din baad ek do din chhod ke unko hai na 50 mili hai aur.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Haan, to dekho mam ye jhoot thodi nahi bolunga mam, milti hai to milti hai mam.
Customer: Wo to sahi baat hai sir, lekin maine unse baat kari to unhone. Ek account tha mera, ek baat suno, suno, suno to ek account tha agar tumhe nahi vishwas to main uska GST number bhi bata dunga.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ya aadhar ka wo PAN card number bata dunga us Balaji Traders ke naam se. Suno to ek meri sun lo bas Balaji Traders ke naam se. Haan, sun rahi hu.
Executive: Haan, to fir maine wo bhi account band karwa diya sirf aur sirf kya 50 lead wo 50 lead ke chakkar mein.
Customer: Achha.
Customer: Samjhi mam, maine isliye band karwa diya, main ye bhi band karwa dunga chahe beshak mujhe 4-5000 ka.
Executive: Sir ek minute main call forward kar rahi hu apne manager ko unse baat kar lijiye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye kya problem aa rahi hai sir?
Executive: Mam mujhe lead chahiye.
Customer: Ji main samajh gayi hu sir, par mujhe ye bataiye ki jo jinhone aapko bola tha unse humne subah mein communicate kiya, wo keh rahe ki Rohit Dubey se, Rohit Dubey aap keh rahe the na? To unse humne communicate kiya sir unhone.
Executive: Mam ek baat suno.
Customer: Suno, suno, suno, suno.
Executive: Mere ek dost hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Usne, usne aapke 9696 pe call karke pehle to service ke liye baat ki thi usne. Thik hai fir usne IndiaMART mein kaisa laga to unko bhi aise hi kaha gaya hum 50 lead denge jis pe bhi unka manager bana ya jo bhi employee bana unka us ladke ka to usne bhi usko provide ki thi aur ek nahi do dosto ko.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Usne dono ne hai na chalu kiya tha to mujhe 50 lead mili aur suno ek baat aur suno. Main samajh rahi hu.
Customer: Mera ek aur account tha IndiaMART pe keval aur keval ek se do mahine chala tha Balaji Traders ke naam se. Maine isi reason ki wajah se maine usko bhi band karwa diya aur main isko bhi band karwa dunga beshak mujhe 4-5000 ka loss ho jaye par main hai na mujhe lead milengi to to thik hai warna main band kar dunga isko.
Customer: Sir ek cheez main ye bol rahi hu ki aap jo keh rahe ho ki C to C customer care pe call karne se aapko lead mil jayegi, waise system nahi hota hai. Customer care pe jab call jaati hai.
Executive: Nahi suno to pehle puri baat sun liya karo jab bola karo. Dekho 96 pe usne pehle to service service ke bare mein baat kiya. Thik hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Fir aapke employee ya fir manager jo bhi hai ha dost ne bata raha hu uska. Fir usne employee wagera ya fir kisi ka manager wagera ka phone aaya uske baad ki sir aapko service chahiye. To usi ne bande ne bola tha jiske jis se uski baat hui ho hai fir usne usko dilwai hui thi ek din chhod ke dusre din teesre din dilwa di thi usko aur mere ko ho gaye ek hafte.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Sir unko aise nahi mili hogi ki unhone customer care pe.
Executive: Par mujhe mam dekho lead chahiye agar ho paye to bata do yes ya no, faltu ki baat nahi bol raha. Meri baat suno.
Customer: Sir yes no nahi, mere pass aapka account abhi transfer hua hai sir. Thik hai to mujhe.
Executive: Mujhe ye bata do final, final result.
Customer: Mujhe nahi pata ki aapki kya baat hui hai. Ab aap meri baat suno, suno, suno, suno, suno. Sir ek baat bata do clear mujhe hoga ya nahi bas ha ya nahi.
Executive: Aap pehle aapne bola aapne suna na.
Customer: Sir hoga, hoga. Par aapko dekhiye solution 9696 call karna isliye nahi hota hai. 9696 tab use kiya jata hai sir jab aapke pass aapke pass account manager nahi hai ya account manager se aapki baat nahi hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants 50 leads as promised earlier.

- Claims friends received 50 leads after initial leads.

- Expresses frustration over lack of leads.



Resolution:

- Executive forwarded the call to the manager.

- Executive explained 9696 is not for lead generation.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, customer care, account manager

seller_categories.mcat_name: Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
